game.name: Stellar Warfare
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Space RTS with base building and ship customization. Personal passion project. More than 200 available ships, weapons and modules to design your fleet with. Contains a small campaign, several single and multiplayer game modes and a coop game mode. Also contains Wave defense!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Space RTS with base building and ship customization. Personal passion project. More than 200 available ships, weapons and modules to design your fleet with. Contains a small campaign, several single and multiplayer game modes and a coop game mode. Also contains Wave defense!

reviewHighlights.text: soo my first try, i was sure i will give this game back becuse ethier my laptop begin to weak or i dont gona like it as in pictures. but i do, but but...
I bought this because the dev posted about it on a meme site and I thought "Hey, that looks pretty good". For a small development game, it is pretty f...
